title: SQL Basics
points: Constraints (PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, UNIQUE, NOT NULL, etc.)

title: Querying Data
points: Sorting data with ORDER BY clause
Limiting and pagination using LIMIT/OFFSET clauses
Joining tables (INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, and FULL JOIN)

title: Advanced SQL Topics
points: Aggregate functions (COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX, MIN)

title: SQL in Practice
points: SQL in different RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, etc.)
Integrating SQL with programming languages (Python, Java, C#, etc.)
SQL injection and security best practices

title: Projects and Assignments
points: Hands-on projects and assignments to reinforce concepts
Building a database for a specific domain
Designing and implementing a database schema
Integrating SQL with a programming language
Building data analysis and reporting tools
